input.sentences: i went on vacation last weekend .
there were a lot of old buildings out in the countryside .
i had a great time touring all of them .
there were some old ruins as well .
my dog had a great time .
output.sentences: We went on a camping weekend.
There was a beautiful old church nearby.
We visited the church and saw an amazing ruin of an old tower.
There was also a fascinating graveyard with graves hundreds of years old
Even the dog enjoy walking around the sights.
